_sText:
HOSTIES_in_space !!!


by

ZaLoS

skybox texture by Karatekaefer

Rotating skybox by UdelSteve


CTs have captured a ship of Ts and are going to put them to work on their 

space station. Boss them around or put them in jail. :D


custom LR:

Russian Roulette

Go to the bottom of the engine room to play russian roulette. The blue spot 

starts the hammer, it will randomly stop and kill a person. 


Have fun

If we find any major bugs ill release a new version with bugs fixed :D


special thanks to:
www.solidsurf.info, www.fpsbanana.com, and intox. gaming.


Play hosties @ 72.5.86.129:27015



If you dont like hdr turn it off with mat_hdr_enabled 0




v1:

The captain button is only accessible after 1:20 secs
Space should kill you now. :D

v2:
Space really should kill you now.
Made stairs easier to go up for the ship.
Moved ct spawn closer to T spawn.
Made russain roulette not breakable.
The alternate route for Ts is now sometimes locked and thus not always an option.
Cts can now open the door to the ship via button outside the ship. 

v2c:
The button that opens the cargo bay now sparks and is only activated by damage. 
The button that opens the cargo bay may now only be opened by terrorist to reduce CTS effing up gameplay. :D
